title: 'GM Street': Friday Focus: Divisional Round (Ep. 219)
description:
The Ringer's Michael Lombardi and Tate Frazier kick off your weekend with a look at the Jon Gruden press conference (00:30) and the coaching shake-ups in Buffalo (08:00), Seattle (09:00), and Carolina (11:00) before previewing the four playoff matchups this weekend (15:15).

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
